PageWidgetPortable.Title: Consumo previsto
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PR_ITEMCONSUMOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.APONTAMENTO IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM PR_ORDEMPRODUCAOAPONTAMENTOS B WHERE (B.STATUS=1) OR (B.STATUS=3))) AND (A.ORDEMPRODUCAOITEM = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1843_at2006_hsdd3e297a.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Consumo realizado
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PR_ITEMCONSUMOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.APONTAMENTO IN (SELECT B.HANDLE FROM PR_ORDEMPRODUCAOAPONTAMENTOS B WHERE (B.STATUS=2))) AND (A.ORDEMPRODUCAOITEM = @CAMPO(HANDLE))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1843_at2007_hs45884aa4.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Ordem de compra
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_ORDENSCOMPRA.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN ( SELECT O.ORDEMCOMPRA FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS O WHERE O.HANDLE IN (SELECT I.ORDEMCOMPRAITEM FROM PR_ORDEMPRODUCAOITENS I WHERE I.HANDLE = @RASTRO(PR_ORDEMPRODUCAOITENS) ) )</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1529_at6178_hsa79aa566.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Requisição consumo de produção
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_REQUISICOESPAI.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT REQUISICAOPAI FROM CP_REQUISICOES WHERE HANDLE IN (SELECT REQUISICAO FROM PR_REQUISICOESCONSUMOITEM WHERE ORDEMPRODUCAOITEM = @RASTRO(PR_ORDEMPRODUCAOITENS)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2311_at5434_hs5bec4919.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Requisições de compra
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_REQUISICOESPAI.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN ( SELECT REQUISICAOPAI FROM CP_REQUISICOES WHERE HANDLE = (SELECT REQUISICAO FROM PR_ORDEMPRODUCAOITENS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(PR_ORDEMPRODUCAOITENS)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2311_at6177_hs6c62089d.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
